name: SharePointFeatureVersioning
description: Set version of a SharePoint feature
helpMarkDown: Allows to change the version of SharePoint features. Supports changing the version before compile time in .feature files. [More Information](https://github.com/iozag/sharepoint-build-tasks)
author: IOZ AG

inputs.name: FeatureFile
inputs.label: File pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the SharePoint feature file which should be updated. Wildcards can be used. For example `**\*.feature` for all feature files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version which should be set in the feature.
